summary: Wishing to find peace, Zatoichi travels to his old village but only finds trouble when he ends up in a love triangle and finds old scores have followed him home.
cast: Shintarô Katsu|Mikiko Tsubouchi|Seizaburô Kawazu|Fujio Suga|Mieko Kondô|Chitose Maki|Tatsuo Endô|Gen Kimura|Kanae Kobayashi|Yutaka Nakamura|Shôsaku Sugiyama
title: Shin Zatôichi monogatari
